EmailTemplate.description: BI-EMEA CH Letter to an end customer. Fabricator is no QN-member.
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA APP Letter To End-cust Inst Done By Non-Ind Partner - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Corian® Solid Surface: Info about Case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir, Madam,
After checking our records we found out that the fabricator of your installation in
Corian® Solid Surface dated from {!Case.Installation_Date__c}, does not belong to our
Quality Network of authorized fabricators unfortunately.
The Corian® Solid Surface ten (10) Year Limited Installed Warranty applies exclusively to
interior decorative Corian® Solid Surface installations that are installed and fabricated by
Corian® Solid Surface Quality Network Installers/Fabricators and in accordance with
the installation procedure in force at the time of installation.
Therefore this warranty cannot be granted and does not cover the costs involved. However, we have a network of Corian® Solid Surface Quality Network fabricators,
which have the necessary know-how to carry out repairs or maintenance works for you.
If you are interested, please contact us so we can inform you about the service centre
and/or Industrial Partner which is nearest to you.
For any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}
{!Case.OwnerEmail}
We want to inform you that we collect your information to identify your business interests, provide you with
products or services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal
information (name, e-Mail, phone number, and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer systems
primarily hosted in the United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates, partners,
and selected third parties in other countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend, delete or
oppose to the processing of your information, use this link.
DuPont™ and Corian® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its
affiliates. The usage of logos, trademarks and registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company
must be authorized by E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or by one of its affiliated companies.
